thread.title: ChromeInfotech is recognized as an Excellent Application Developer by Clutch
thread.title_full: ChromeInfotech is recognized as an Excellent Application Developer by Clutch | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: ChromeInfotech is recognized as an Excellent Application Developer by Clutch
text:
(MENAFN Press) Mobile Application Testing Service at Chrome Infot NOIDA India - Oct. 12 2015 - PRLog -- IndiaChromeInfotech is a world renowned application development company. It has been recognized as a top application developer by Clutch (review and rating company) for the year 2015.With the growing technology business owners have found ample opportunity for advertising there business and services globally by implementing a mobile application. Thus it is an absolute necessary that the company meets all the challenges meticulously while developing a mobile application and delivers a user-friendly and attractive app which will benefit the end user. There are various mobile application development companies present in the market but there are very few that hold expertise in developing good apps; one of them is ChromeInfotech. They have left no stone unturned to meet all odds and has emerged as one of a kind mobile application development company. Their dedicated service has helped them emerge as one of the top mobile application development company in the world. In a rating scale of zero to five most clients of ChromeInfotech have rated them 5 out of 5 on a B2B review website Clutch.Clutch is one of the renowned B2B firms that deliver the reviews about software development and other professional companies about their service and popularity. Clutch helps the start-up mid-market or a large-scale enterprise to get genuine reviews for their service. Clutch is a website that provides reviews from authentic sources of information for buyers and sellers of software development.By analyzing the research made by Clutch we can conclude that ChromeInfotech has proved itself to be the best application development company in India. And they have developed a team of young and dynamic members who offers excellent service on time and with all the specifications required by their clients.So if you are planning to hire the mobile application services in India then contact ChromeInfotech. Contact them at 91 120-412-4675 (India) or 1-408-786-5369 (USA) or email at: t the Company:ChromeInfo Technologies Pvt. Ltd. is software solutions and services company with expertise in mobile apps development web development and software testing; structured to optimize the most appropriate blend of onsite and offsite services.We work as Technology Partner for Entrepreneurs Enterprises Middle-Small scaled businesses and creative individuals and get them covered right from innovative design to robust development till launch of quality assured product in the market. Over the last 5 years we have successfully deployed over 500 projects for Mobile and Web. We are also recognize and awarded by the renowned organizations for mobile application development and services.Contact Details:Nidhi SinghBusiness Development ManagerC-260 Sector 63NoidaUttar Pradesh201301Ph: 0120 - 4124675Email: ebsite: http://www.chromeinfotech.com/ ContactNidhi Singh919810600971***chromeinfotech.com--- End ---
